GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v4.14.301
GSD.description:
hwmon: (coretemp) Check for null before removing sysfs attrs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.301 by commit 070d5ea4a0592a37ad96ce7f7b6b024f90bb009f, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 199e0de7f5df31a4fc485d4aaaf8a07718252ace. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: hwmon: (coretemp) Check for null before removing sysfs attrs
